Sul lato oscuro / On the Dark Side

description: With a jealous admirer and a bitter, powerful mother plotting behind his back, Habaek's controversial decision to return Soah to his magical kingdom has the elemental gods and goddesses in an uproar. Habaek, the moody water god who rescued Soah's village from famine and drought, is also dealing with a curse that turns him into a child during the day and reverts him to his true adult form at night. While some of the inhabitants of his domain are friendly to his human bride -- and some are a bit too friendly -- Habaek has kept his curse secret from Soah, who's become completely confused by all the attention and resentment her presence brings! When night falls, Habaek pretends to be the aloof, handsome god Mui, whose irresistible charisma and flirtations with Soah have her thinking that she's about ready to cheat on her immature spouse. It may be about time for Habaek/Mui to come clean! And who's really responsible for the death of his previous human bride?
name: Volume 5

description: The Toyman and Mr. Freeze activate the ultimate weapon — the new and improved Composite Superman/Batman robot — in an attempt to destroy all Kryptonians. This looks like a job for the World's Finest, as Superman returns from New Krypton to team up with Dick Grayson Batman to stop the rampaging robot once and for all!
name: Superman & Batman

description: The Autobot special ops crew, The Wreckers, are sent to investigate Garrus-9, a prison that fell to the Decepticons three years ago with no communication in or out since. Who’s really behind the prison siege, and what dark secret awaits Springer there? Writer/artist Nick Roche (Maximum Dinobots) does all the dirty work.

volume.name: The Transformers: Last Stand Of The Wreckers

description: Captain Marvel has faced many adversaries lately, but none may be worse than his evil mirror image known as Niatpac Levram! The Magic of Shazam is definitely unpredictable now! Also, Billy must face a threat so diabolical and so menacing that has been lying dormant for quite sometime. A villain known as...Mr. Mind!
name: Mr. Mind Over Matter

volume.name: Billy Batson and the Magic of SHAZAM!

description: Chuckles is the only man alive to have successfully infiltrated Cobra... and he’s M.I.A. Has he been killed? Defected? Gone rogue to fight a one-man war against the enemy? None of these alternatives are acceptable to General Hawk. He wants Chuckles back with G.I. Joe, so he’s sending a new Joe to retrieve him. But what she finds may be worse than anyone could have imagined... Also, get a deeper look inside Cobra than ever before, as Tomax, Xamot, and Erika continue to feel the effects of the previous miniseries, and several Cobra operatives are introduced for the first time in an IDW book!
name: Forked Tongue

description: It’s back to the beach for the GD crew for this year’s End of Summer Swimsuit issue! See all the lovely ladies and gorgeous guys of the GD cast sporting about in the sand and surf!
B/W compilation issue of the original four issue Gold Digger mini-series.

concept_credits.name: Were Races in the Gold Digger Universe

first_appearance_concepts.name: Were Races in the Gold Digger Universe

name: Tip & Tap e il mistero del ratmore college

description: Celebrate Halloween GD style! These tales of fun and terror feature a Fred Perry "GD -18" tale as well as new stories from Fred Perry, David Hutchison, Ben Dunn, Rod Espinosa and more. A treat for any GD fan--don't be tricked by imitations!

Celebrate Halloween GD style! More tales of fun and terror, featuring an adventure from Fred Perry as well as new stories from your favorite A.P. artists! Fill your Halloween goodie bag with one of the sweetest treats you can get—and without having to shell out for a costume!

Get a bagful of frightful fun and monstrous laughs in this latest GD Halloween celebration! Fred Perry and your other favorite A.P. artists bring you tales of creatures, costumes and candy to brighten your dark night. There's no trick to this treat—and it won't harm your teeth (as long as you don't eat it)!

Fred Perry's wily were-rat trio explode in their own mini-series! With the death of her parents, the were-rat clan elders, Lydia Iceron (a.k.a. McKraken) is now the heir to the clan's throne. She doesn't have any immediate interest in it, but there are others who do... mainly a few members of Crime Syndicate X! But as long as Lydia's alive, no one else can claim the throne...

Fred Perry's action- and hilarity-packed writing combines with the eye-catching art of fan-favorite Craig Babiar (Warrior Nun, I Hunt Monsters) to form one incredible, roller-coaster ride of a mini-series! This issue also features a front cover by Fred and a flip cover by Craig!
name: The Dark Heiress

description: Lydia, Moisha and Romeo regroup on their new yacht to figure out what to do about the people out to kill Lydia so the were-rat throne--and the reins of the criminal underworld--will be up for grabs. Between the stealthy Techninja scoping them out, the power-packin' T-Hawk and the feral Rabid striking head-on, and the indestructible zombie Burnhead heading their way with an underwater mine, the were-rats might not survive long enough to leave a sinking ship!
name: Yacht-Sea!

description: The were-rat trio have set up shop in a Columbian cartel's headquarters after buying out the old drug lord's minions and guards. Lydia quickly turns on Moisha and Romeo, though, driving them away, but this only gives Techninja and his supervillain team a prime chance to capture Lydia's friends!
name: Columbian (Neck)Ties...

description: Lydia is defeated. She is now Techninja's willing slave, an oracle of the greatest artifact in all of the underworld, the Throne of Shadows. With it, Lydia sees clearly through the darkests of shadows, the secrets of the blackest hearts. But in her vision, she also sees her allies moving to the rescue.
name: Badass Of The Underworld!!!

description: Fred Perry’s online extravaganza is now collected in print for the first time! Once again, Fred proves that there’s just too much story in the GD-verse to contain in one series! Enjoy the tribulations of Ayane “Mistress” Anno, the gorgeous-but-frightening champion freestyle fighter, in her search to add a little cuteness to her life, and the ongoing adventures of the Northern Edge Guard as they face the problems accompanying new recruits, evil death-wabbits, and more!

Continuing the FULL-COLOR printed collection of Fred Perry’s online Gold Digger adventures! Thrill, laugh and cringe in sympathy as Ayane “Mistress” Anno tries to go on a normal date while preserving her tough public image, and the new members of the Northern Edge Guard must face more menace from the devastating death-wabbits!

Continuing the printed collection of Fred Perry’s online Gold Digger adventures! Cheer, jeer, wince and grin as Ayane “Mistress” Anno tricks all her enemies into a noisy, nasty fight, and the new members of the Northern Edge-Guard find themselves caught between giant spiders, sneaky kobolds, a deceitful dragon, and a guilty conscience!

Continuing the printed collection of Fred Perry’s online Gold Digger adventures! Celebrate ringside as Ayane “Mistress” Anno continues the fight to avenge her bruised reputation, and thrill to the tension as Northern Edge-Guard members Calandra and Raphiel struggle to survive scheming kobolds and the deadly dragon Contessa!

name: Zio Paperone e i dirigibili irresistibili
Paperino, Paperoga e i paperi drammatici

description: The Dragonblade, owned by the first Dragon Emperor, is on Britanny Diggers' list of "things to get." She and her sister, super-scientist/archeaologist Gina Diggers, attempt to find it first because legend has it that it will grant the owner one wish. However, for that very reason a web other fortune-seekers is also vying to find it before they do. Meanwhile, Asrial learns of a possible ancient Salusian city that may have been built on Earth 50,000 years ago. When Asrial heads toward the possible site she arrives smack-dab in the middle of a treasure-hunting free-for-all that eventually leads to the dreaded Dragon Maze!

name: Topolino e il babur di Jaipur

description: The classic Gold Digger special was the very first full color issue ever! Gina and her were-cheetah sister, along with rival Penny and her bodyguard harpy Charlotte, investigate ancient inter-dimensional ruins... and discover beings that come from before the big-bang... the beta-phantoms!

The origin of the Pink Avenger revealed! It's GD minus 12 as the fertile imagination and flashing pen of Fred Perry take you back to a turning point in the childhood of your favorite GD characters! Vice-Principal Venomiss is sick of schoolkids having fun on her time, and she and Dorris the cafeteria worker are going to do something about it! It's up to comic-book fan and would-be superhero Danielle Carter to stop them—if she can convince her new friend Britanny Diggers to help!

volume.name: Gold Digger Adventures Stand Alone Special

name: C'era una volta in America: Topolino e il cavallo di ferro
Manetta e l'indagine natalizia
Orazio e le riparazioni a catena
Topolino e l'audace colpo della TST
Topolino e la scoperta di New York
La coppa racconta: Il mondiale scomparso
Black Widow #1

description:
Stories:
 
1. Man of War - Man of War fights evil dictator who is the pawn of Mars.
 
2. Vapo Man.  - Vapo Man fights Nazis.
 
3.  Dopey Danny Day - Comic relief adventure strip (looks very much like Johnny Thunder)
 
4. Red Riley - Hardboiled cop.
 
5. Wild Ride - short story.
 
6. The Sentinel - Mystic hero in American Revolutionary War costume fights Nazi saboteurs.
 
7. Fire Man - Costumed hero fights fire, with fire!
 
8. Dave Doolittle the Dizzy Detective - comic strip.
 
9. Liberty Guards - A secret trio fights on land, sea and air for America's security.
name: You must invade...now!

description: In this standalone tale, the Doctor and Donna attempt to broker a peace plan between two very hierarchical and pompous alien races, the Draconians and Ice Warriors. But their best efforts are derailed by someone who stands to gain from the continued conflict. Written by TV show story editor Gary Russell with art by Adrian Salmon.
name: One-Shot

description:
Somewhere in the African desert, thousands of miles from civilization, a group of geneticists, led by Kazushi Nikken, has conducted unholy experiments involving both human and animal DNA.

This is the story of the birth of Hieronymous Flask and the Elephantmen and their eventual liberation from the torturous world of MAPPO.

Re-presenting the Origin of the Elephantmen from the SOLD OUT first issue of HIP FLASK.
name: Unnatural Selection

description: Africa and China are at war. The battlefield: Europe. Enter: MAPPO's genetically engineered soldiers, The Elephantmen. At last, Starkings & Moritat tell the story of the war to end all wars in this special three issue mini series.
name: Invasion!

description: As TV cameras head for Santa Monica to cover the meteor that crash landed in the Bay, we check in with Skycab pilot, Miki, as she downloads comics in the break room at the taxi garage.
name: The Pilot

description: France has fallen to MAPPO... but even the Elephantmen have sustained heavy casualties. As Africa's forces advance into the North of Europe, Hip Flask, Ebony Hide and Obadiah Horn find that their way forward is not as easy as they thought it would be.
name: Resistance Is Useless!

description: Even in the face of blistering resistance, it seems that nothing can stop MAPPO's advance across Scandinavia. But as Hip Flask comes face to face with the last vestiges of humanity in the frozen Scandinavian wastes, he discovers that only the dead see the end of warfare.
name: The Sweet taste of Victory?

description: Sonja Blue, everyones favorite schizophrenic undead punk chick, makes her long awaited comics debut in the adaption of the award winning best-seller Sunglasses After Dark. This aint Vamps!
name: Issue 1
Paperino e il record di velocità
